sql_queries.sql_query: SELECT CONCAT(FLOOR(average_price / 100000) * 100000, '-', FLOOR(average_price / 100000) * 100000 + 99999) AS bin, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM house_price_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY FLOOR(average_price / 100000) ORDER BY FLOOR(average_price / 100000);

SELECT CONCAT(FLOOR(average_price / 100000) * 100000, '-', FLOOR(average_price / 100000) * 100000 + 99999) AS bin, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM house_price_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2023' GROUP BY bin ORDER BY bin;
SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_price) AS x_value, AVG(median_price) AS y_value FROM house_price_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2023' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_price) AS value FROM house_price_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2023' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT CONCAT(FLOOR(average_price / 100000) * 100000, '-', FLOOR(average_price / 100000) * 100000 + 99999) AS bin, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM house_price_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY FLOOR(average_price / 100000) ORDER BY FLOOR(average_price / 100000);
SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_price) AS value FROM house_price_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2023' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY value DESC;
